content: westknits simple socks by stephen west this top-down sock pattern begins with a ribbed cuff and continues with simple stockinette stitch for the leg the heel features a simple garter stitch heel flap use this pattern with your fingering weight sock yarn and customize the colors to create your own colorful socks the leg and foot of the sock are easily customizable so you can achieve the foot the lengths of the cuff leg and foot are easily customizable by knitting more textured pattern repeats for a longer leg or foot or fewer textured pattern repeats for a shorter leg or foot yarn
